1123357206433402881.text:
NinerAlert: Buildings being swept by law enforcement. 

Law enforcement is individually sweeping buildings on campus. Follow officer commands.

1123415467190886403.text: Niner Transit is currently operating 3 Green and 2 Silver Line buses  to help transport individuals to their residence hall or vehicle. Service will run until 2am. Paratransit requests will be accommodated as well.

1123388697808969728.text: NinerAlert: The campus remains on lockdown while police clear each building. This could take several more hours. Check email for more details.

1122903561925472256.text:
We have another headed to the NFL!

LB @Juwan_Foggie signs as an undrafted free agent with the Buffalo Bills.  

Congrats, Fog Dog!  Couldn't be prouder of all you've accomplished!

More:
http://bit.ly/2XUG6bY pic.twitter.com/tRynoncsxl

1123347449643446279.text: NinerAlert: Campus lockdown continues. Remain in a safe location. Monitor email and UNCC homepage.

1123371332547284992.text:
Scene secure. One in custody. No reason to believe anyone else involved.

CMPD and UNCC going room by room on campus to identify any students, faculty or others who may be sheltering in place.

1122333677470593024.text: BALLGAME!!!!!!!!!!! Niners erase a 9-4 deficit after seven innings, force extras and win it with a run in the 14th inning!!!!!!!!!!!!pic.twitter.com/nPRcJu2UHC

1123425426079133696.text: Statement from Chancellor Dubois: http://bit.ly/2GMOKCu pic.twitter.com/k9Nx53YH0Y

1123211650696392704.text: Today starts the @CharlotteFTBL Season Ticket Holder Away Game Pre-Sale! Be on the look-out for an email shortly with your purchase instructions.pic.twitter.com/0rfs9K6Op6

1123403659533017088.text: The @unccunion has been cleared and can now serve as a gathering place for students and staff. @NinerAlertspic.twitter.com/soXk7mBruA

1123380980377640966.text: All University activities scheduled for tonight are canceled. Lockdown continues. Monitor email. @NinerAlertspic.twitter.com/VtGCouxCjX

1123441373674442752.text: NinerAlert:  University moving to Condition 2 suspended operations at midnight on May 1. More information: http://emergency.uncc.edu/campus-updates .

1123352839663837185.text: TONIGHT'S GAME HAS BEEN CANCELED! Please stay where you are!

1123357098052661248.text: ALERT: UNC Charlotte Students and families, please head to 8600 University City Boulevard. We are sending all students there to be reunified with their families.

1123419661415145472.text: NinerAlert: Remaining occupants of UNC Charlotte campus buildings may depart at this time. Check email for more.
